rules.description: Change right_option key to Meta key
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change right_command + wasd to arrow keys
Change right_command + pl;' to arrow keys
For Filco only: Swap command and option keys
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change right_command + wasd to arrow keys
Change right_command + pl;' to arrow keys
